item.title: Interaction Provenance
item.description:
Datasets
Analytic Provenance Datasets: A DataRepository of Human Analysis Activityand Interaction Logs
"We present an analytic provenance data repository thatcan be used to study human analysis activity, thought pro-cesses, and software interaction with visual analysis toolsduring exploratory data analysis."



ProvThreads
Responsible for data visualization component of the project.
